Class FlippingBitsBoard

java.lang.Object
  FlippingBitsBoard

public class FlippingBitsBoard
extends java.lang.Object

Represents a board configuration in the game of FlippingBits.

Version:
20160411
Author:
E. Stark

FlippingBitsBoard

public FlippingBitsBoard(int size,
                         boolean rand)
Initialize a board with a specified size and possibly a random configuration.

Parameters:
size - The dimension of the board.
rand - If true, then initialize the board to a random configuration, otherwise the board will be all zeros.
